pages.title: Hemp Plant
pages.text: The Hemp Plant is a strong fibrous plant that grows to my height after it has matured.$(br2)To grow it requires being planted in adequately lit and moist farmland.

pages.title: Hemp Fiber
pages.text: Using the millstone, leaves of this plant can be ground into a very strong fiber with many applications.
The fibers of this plant can be harnessed to make a strong and versatile rope
